unnormalised: Congrats to Aisha Khan on finally bagging that PhD after only 7 yrs! Now she can officially be Dr. Aisha Khan (PhD), and we can all start calling her "Prof" even if she's still figuring out the chai machine.
normalised: Congrats to Aisha Khan on finally bagging that P-h-D after only seven years! Now she can officially be Doctor Aisha Khan (P-h-D), and we can all start calling her "Prof" even if she's still figuring out the chai machine.
